value:
$WmMPID_クリス女,ch01_38_Chris_F_Normal,Face|Whatever harm may come to me,
I will keep Prince Marth safe.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face_Smile|The time has finally come, Brother.$k$pThe moment of our unity
is upon us.$k$p$WmMPID_フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Normal,Face|Then that must be the
necklace Brísingamen.$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face_Smile|I have waited long for its restoration.
So...so long.$k$pWith this, we will expand our lands
to new realms! The mortal world
will be ours.$k$p$WmMPID_フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Normal,Face|Freyja...$k$pI see now it is already too
late for us.$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|What are you saying?$k$p$WmMPID_フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Normal,Face|If you would willingly bring harm
to the mortal world... You are no
longer the Freyja I knew.$k$pThe love I once felt for you is now
little more than the remnant of a
once-pleasant dream upon waking.$k$pWhen our dream world was ruined,
so too were we...$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face_Anger|No! ...NO! We survived. We are still
here. That is why we MUST do this!$k$p$WmMPID_フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Normal,Face|...The mortals gave up their dreams.
The world of dreams will inevitably
return to nothingness.$k$pYou remember, do you not?
Our world being torn apart,
holes ripping through it...$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|I remember. But we SAVED it.
The children drank the nectar...
They became álfar.$k$pThey pulled us from the nothingness.
They saved us...$k$p$WmMPID_フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Normal,Face|Those children will never be human
again. We took that from them and
made them to fight.$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Ever the stubborn one, Brother.
Always concerned with the mortals,
but never with me...$k$p$EFace_Smile|But this necklace will surely change
your mind...isn't that right?$k$p$WmMPID_フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Normal,Face|Freyja, please...$k$p
